title: L8 React Capstone #1
description: Complete this capstone project by implementing: Complete the 'add' requirement.

scaffold.app.jsx:
function App(){ const [text,setText]=React.useState(''); const [items,setItems]=React.useState([]); function add(){ if(!text.trim())return; setItems([...items,text]); setText(''); } return (
setText(e.target.value)} />
    {items.map((it,ix)=>(
  • {it}
    • ))}
);} const root=ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')); root.render();

tests.code: (()=>{const i=document.getElementById('t'); i.value='X'; i.dispatchEvent(new Event('input',{bubbles:true})); document.getElementById('add').click(); return document.querySelectorAll('#list li').length>=1;})()
tests.label: Add
